definition: make a telephone call or mail a package so that the recipient pays, payable by the recipient on delivery, a short prayer generally preceding the lesson in the Church of Rome or the Church of England, to assemble or get together
details:
adverb
- make a telephone call or mail a package so that the recipient pays
= example: make a telephone call or mail a package so that the recipient pays
adjective
- payable by the recipient on delivery
= example: payable by the recipient on delivery
= synonyms: cod
noun
- a short prayer generally preceding the lesson in the Church of Rome or the Church of England
verb
- to assemble or get together
= synonyms: gather
- to get or bring together
= example: to get or bring together
= synonyms: pull in
- to call for and obtain payment of
= example: to call for and obtain payment of
= synonyms: take in
- to get or gather together in an area
= example: to get or gather together in an area
= synonyms: hoard, roll up, accumulate, pile up, compile
- to gather something
= example: to gather something
= synonyms: pick up, call for, gather up
